Here are some facts about me

=== Personal ===

I am living in Bonn/Germany, and graduating in the laws at the University of Bonn.

=== Interests ===

I am interested in IT ever since. Since 4 years I am more and more interested in Linux with specialty to ubuntu. First on server-side in the meantime also on desktop.

Here my special interests are:
* Syncing PIM-Information and files between different computers and OSes like Ubuntu and Android
* Using NFSv4 with Kerberos
* General use of Ubuntu on Desktop and Server
